name: Asterlode
description:
Asterlode is a 2D sci-fi themed exploration and mining game. Destructible tile based maps allow you to go on an adventure from the furthest reaches of the Solar System to the dangerous core regions of asteroids, comets and moons. Freely roam your way through the Solar System and find your own path!

  • Trade with the local factions. Space stations and outposts throughout the system need resources. Can you mine and deliver them? For a fee of course!
  • Collect the rarest ships and weapons. Raid a research outpost for the highest tech equipment or maybe buy the fastest ship with your mining profits. The universe is full of varied loot to find and use!
  • Mine your way into riches. Search for the most lucrative asteroids and comets for various ores and minerals.
  • Complete missions to increase your reputation. The various factions of the Solar System need your help with everything from hauling garbage to tracking down a rumored hostile stealth ship attacking the locals. Are you up to the task?
  • And much more!
